qas.question: What team is Barcelona's local rival?
What club was granted royal patronage?
What type of group founded Espanyol?
Of what element of Barcelona's board did Espanyol disapprove?
Of what does team Espanyol view Barcelona as a team ?

context: Barça's local rival has always been <a0_0>Espanyol<a0_0/>. <a1_0>Blanc-i-blaus<a1_0/>, being one of the clubs granted royal patronage, was founded exclusively by <a2_0>Spanish football fans<a2_0/>, unlike the <a3_0>multinational nature<a3_0/> of Barça's primary board. The founding message of the club was clearly anti-Barcelona, and they disapprovingly saw FC Barcelona as a team of <a4_0>foreigners<a4_0/>. The rivalry was strengthened by what Catalonians saw as a provocative representative of Madrid. Their original ground was in the affluent district of Sarrià.
